publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3529 Mr Gil Paterson: Business Bulletinâ€”That the Parliament believes that, for the purpose of good time management and the ability to keep members fully informed in a cost-effective manner, the Business Bulletin that is published each Monday should be restored to its former effective condition by containing all live motions with a full list of members who have supported each motion.
S1M-3529 Business Bulletin (lodged on 1 November 2002) Stewart Stevenson*, Christine Grahame*
S1M-3529 Business Bulletin (lodged on 1 November 2002) Donald Gorrie*, Michael Matheson*, Alex Neil*
S1M-3529 Business Bulletin (lodged on 1 November 2002) Fergus Ewing*, Tommy Sheridan*
S1M-3529 Business Bulletin (lodged on 1 November 2002) Mr Lloyd Quinan*
S1M-3529 Business Bulletin (lodged on 1 November 2002) Mr Adam Ingram*
S1M-3529 Business Bulletin (lodged on 1 November 2002) Dennis Canavan*, Robin Harper*, Mr Mike Rumbles*, Mr Keith Raffan*, John Farquhar Munro*, Mr Jamie Stone*
S1M-3529 Business Bulletin (lodged on 1 November 2002) Brian Adam*
S1M-3529 Business Bulletin (lodged on 1 November 2002) Mr Kenneth Gibson*, Ms Sandra White*
S1M-3529 Business Bulletin (lodged on 1 November 2002) Mrs Lyndsay McIntosh*
S1M-3529 Business Bulletin (lodged on 1 November 2002) Elaine Smith*
S1M-3529 Business Bulletin (lodged on 1 November 2002) Mr Kenny MacAskill*
